org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.gwt
Class XMLJUnitResultFormatter

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.gwt.XMLJUnitResultFormatter

public class XMLJUnitResultFormatter
extends Object

Source copied from org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLJUnitResultFormatter and modified to prefix testcase classname when running in GWT production mode. Extending the class is not possible due to the fact that all relevant class fiels are declared private.

See Also:
FormatterElement
